params.duration: Duration in seconds until market closes
params.question: The market question

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.side: true for YES, false for NO

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.outcome: true if YES wins, false if NO wins

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

claimWinnings(uint256).notice: Claim winnings from a winning bet

emergencyWithdraw().notice: Emergency withdraw (only if no active markets)

getMarketBets(uint256).notice: Get all bets for a market

getUserBets(address).notice: Get all bets for a user

placeBet(uint256,bool).notice: Place a bet on a market

resolveMarket(uint256,bool).notice: Resolve a market with the final outcome
